snippet: One reason for building so many nursing homes in the Rockaways was that their residents were thought not to need easy access to the city’s job centers.
abstract: FYI column on why the Rockaway Beach Peninsula in Queens is home to so many nursing homes, most of which suffered heavy damage in Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: One reason for building so many nursing homes in the Rockaways was that their residents were thought not to need easy access to the city’s job centers.

headline.seo: Why So Many Nursing Homes in the Rockaways?
headline.main: Why So Many Nursing Homes in the Rockaways?
